name: Henry's Wet Dream
description:
Henry wasn't a normal and nice lumberjack. After his death, as penance, he has to graze the devil's Flames and protect them from water.

A Ludum Dare 46 game.

Can Henry the Lumberjack light Flames' fire?

Controls:

WSAD / Arrows - Movement

Space - Pick up / put down objects

Disclaimer:

It's a pretty easy and relaxing game but we hope you find the experience satisfying. Have fun watching it all BURN!
